props.clearIcon: Applied when using **clearable** and the input is dirty
props.flat: Removes elevation (shadow) added to element when using the **solo** or **solo-inverted** props
props.persistentPlaceholder: Forces placeholder to always be visible
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the outnside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.prependInnerIcon: Prepends an icon inside the component's input, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.rounded: Adds a border radius to the input
props.toggleKeys: Array of key codes that will toggle the input (if it supports toggling)
props.counterValue: Function returns the counter display text
props.role: The role attribute applied to the input

events.blur: Emitted when the input is blurred
events.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction
events.click:append-outer: Emitted when appended outer icon is clicked
events.click:prepend-inner: Emitted when prepended inner icon is clicked
events.click:prepend: Emitted when prepended icon is clicked
events.click:append: Emitted when append icon is clicked
events.click:appendInner: Emitted when appended inner icon is clicked
events.click:prependInner: Emitted when prepended inner icon is clicked
